content:
Engineering and sapl units of the State Special Service clean up the territories of deocuporated Kherson region from explosive objects.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces, reports the Armyinform.

As a result of the fighting in the fields, there are many broken equipment, unobtrusive ammunition, replaced areas, many arrivals that have not worked - and all this must be found and neutralized by our sappers.

“We have a very responsible job. First, you always think for your brothers. Secondly, you are responsible for the people who will work here and process these fields, ”says one of the sappers.

Earlier the Armyinformreported, which in the Kherson region is equipped with a second line of defense.
title: Engineers and sappers purify the territory of deocal Kherson region
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces informs about it, reports the Armyinform. As a result of hostilities in the fields ...
author: Army Inform
